#summary Files and information related to the code editor SciTE

= Introduction =

This wiki is a place to share files and information regarding the code editor [http://www.scintilla.org/SciTE.html SciTE]. You are welcome to add information or links under one of the pages:

= Categories =
<font size="4">[Translations]</font> <br/> Display SciTE interface in other languages.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[Customization Programming language extras]</font> <br/> properties files, api files, other material for computer languages.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[Scripts Scripts and macros]</font> <br/> Scripts for text editing, productivity.
<br/><br/>
<font size="4">[CustomBuilds SciTE extensions, projects]</font> <br/> Patches, custom builds, installation packages, tools.
<br/><br/>
